column1: The First Eastfarthing Troop was a troop of Shirriffs formed during the troubled times in the Shire under the rule of Sharkey. The troop was based in the Shirriff-house at Frogmorton on the East Road. It was the First Eastfarthing Troop that attempted to arrest Frodo Baggins and the Travellers on their journey to Bag End.
